Package no.ntnu.idatt1005.plate.controller.ui.mainviews

Class UiInventoryController

java.lang.Object
no.ntnu.idatt1005.plate.controller.ui.mainviews.UiInventoryController
public class UiInventoryController extends Object
Controller class for the inventory view.
Version:
1.0
